children.subject:
Updated with the new NP videos.

Does this round out the videos?  Are there any more lessons outside the above, or is this the final listing?
Looks like the schedule was updated on the class website as well.
Updated with what I THINK is the final videos for the class. Can someone let us know?

Finally, a link to our schedule: https://8803ga.wordpress.com/lecture-schedule/

Thanks and good luck!
-Brent
